str2: Woe!, alas!, uttered in grief or denunciation. A primary exclamation of grief; 'woe'.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Vocative Masculine Plural
str2: To fill up, satisfy. Or empletho em-play'-tho; from en and the base of pleistos;to fill in, i.e. to satisfy.
A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To be hungry, needy, desire earnestly. From the same as penes; to famish; figuratively, to crave.
Woe!, alas!, uttered in grief or denunciation. A primary exclamation of grief; 'woe'.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Vocative Masculine Plural
str2: To laugh, smile. Of uncertain affinity; to laugh.
A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To mourn, lament, feel guilt. From penthos; to grieve.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To weep, weep for, mourn, lament. Of uncertain affinity; to sob, i.e. Wail aloud.
